title: Legend of the Pumpkin King
description: Jack Thatch thought things couldn't get any worse. Picked on and taunted by bullies, his life was a nightmare. Warned by his mother to avoid the farmers' fields at night, Jack thinks the Pumpkin King is just a myth used to scare little children, but one cold night while running for his life he learns the truth.Legend of the Pumpkin King is a short story of approximately 1,651 words.
author: J. Michael Radcliffe
